Author: redhotjillypepper
Text: Oh nooooo. That sounds like me a bit ago :(. No, binging on brownies will not help you. Recovery or not, all that will mean is digging yourself deeper in the binge/purge/restrict/etc. hole. Recovery or not, it's not a fun hole to be in. And recovery or not, you deserve better.  &#x200B;  consider some Metamucil, perhaps? it helped me out the other day. at least to stop your hunger until you can get out of emotional eating mode.
